General.Name: Dawning Information Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Dawning Information Industry Co., Ltd. provides high-performance computing, server, storage, cloud computing, and big data products in China and internationally. It offers rack, storage, and blade servers, as well as high-density servers; workstations; disk array and cloud storage products; deeplearning system; and server cabinets and cooling solutions. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Beijing, China.
